verblex: 1. Of liquid in a container, to be reduced in amount or lowered in level, especially so that it is emptied.
2. To drink a container of liquid dry or empty; to finish your drink.
nomlex: 1. The reduction in the level or amount of a liquid in a container, especially by drinking it empty.
2. The time it takes to drink a container of liquid dry; the time it takes for you to finish your drink.
